title: Correction: Comparative Developmental Transcriptomics Reveals Rewiring of a Highly Conserved Gene Regulatory Network during a Major Life History Switch in the Sea Urchin Genus Heliocidaris
fullText:
Notice of Republication

This article was republished on March 4th, 2016 to correct poor figure quality in the PDF version, which was introduced during the typesetting process. The publisher apologizes for these issues with the figure quality. Please download this article again to view the updated version.
